all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Verily, verily I say unto you, blessed are such, for they shall obtain; for I, the Lord, show mercy unto all the meek, and upon all whomsoever I will, that I may be justified when I shall bring them unto judgment.
Doctrine and Covenants 97:2
Quote of the Day
"Worshipping together as “the body of Christ” has unique power and benefits as we teach, serve, and sustain one another."
Elder D. Todd Christofferson | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
